about.aboutContent:
Created for you to visualize our planet and understand how the Earth has changed over time, the Esri Sentinel Explorer app provides the power of Sentinel satellites, which gather data beyond what the eye can see. Use this app to draw on Sentinel's different bands to better explore the planet's geology, vegetation, agriculture, and cities. Additionally, access the entire Sentinel archive to visualize how the Earth's surface has changed since June 2015.

To get a guided look at the Sentinel Explorer app tools, click for a tutorial.

For information on Esri's full imagery capabilities, visit http://www.esri.com/imagery.

To build your own web app like Sentinel Explorer, visit http://developers.arcgis.com and https://github.com/Esri/Imagery-Apps.

For more info about Esri, visit http://www.esri.com.
